constituent: carve, circumference, running track, glass hood, earthenware jar, lidded crock, soil, dirt, ground, mouth, shape
heisigStory: The two primitives here, circumference and shape, belong naturally to the special connotations that differentiate carving from engraving (see frame 1639).
koohiiStory1: A lathe is used to carve a shape with circumference into wood or metal.
koohiiStory2: Start with a circumference and carve away until you get the shape you want.
